amendment.description: To modify the deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to promoting jobs in the United States through international trade to include the reauthorization or extension of trade adjustment assistance programs.

vote.text: Amendment SA 346 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 346 proposed by Senator Collins. (consideration: CR S1969-1970; text: CR S1969) To modify the deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to promoting jobs in the United States through international trade to include the reauthorization or extension of trade adjustment assistance programs.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 346 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 346 proposed by Senator Collins.
